content: this crochet pattern is for a baby jacket that can be made in 7 sizes from newborn up to 24 months the baby coat is made with bulky yarn making the cardigan chunky and warm perfect as a winter jacket with bear shaped pockets and a hood with little bear ears the baby jacket has a gender neutral design making it suitable for baby boys or girls also the crochet baby jacket is simply made with minimal sewing you will need to sew on the bear ears pockets and buttons ⭐️ baby sizes ⭐️ age chest circumference newborn 44cm 0-3 months 48cm 3-6 months 52cm 6-9 months 56cm 9-12 months 60cm 12-18 months 64cm 18-24 months 68cm ⭐️ yarn ⭐️ weight chunky / bulky / #5 brand dreamy wool color cookie dough yardage - 250 290 331 381 431 480 532 yd gauge - 3″ x 3″ square = 7 row of 8 half_double_crochet ⭐️ supplies you will need ⭐️ - 6 5mm crochet hook or hook to match gauge - bulky / chunky / #5 yarn - tape measure - sewing needle - scissors - stitch markers - 4 x buttons 3cm toggle or 2cm round this pattern is easy skill level the pattern is written in us and uk terminology you will need to know basic crochet stitches the baby jacket itself is made in one piece and the ears pockets and buttons are sewn on the crochet pattern is 8 pages long and includes progress photos a free basic online version of this crochet pattern is available on https //hookfully com/
